original_title: 結婚式直前から式の終りまで…新婦の目を盗んで新郎を誘い寝取る美人ウエディングプランナー
overview: "I want people's things and people's happiness ..." For a wedding that will never be forgotten ... Invite a marriage blue groom to sleep, invite them to sleep alone in the fitting room, and deep kiss just before the ceremony & A beautiful wedding planner who defeats the groom with a vacuum blower and misleads the groom with a serious sleeping SEX that is in love with her during the wedding ceremony. Happiness breaks and falls asleep! "A man gives priority to his desires ...".
title: From Right Before The Wedding Until The End Of The Ceremony... A Beautiful Wedding Planner Who Tempted And Fucked The Groom From Right Underneath The Bride Moe Amatsuka
